divs: sighting detailswhile outside on stated date, we were having quite a rain storm with dark, black low cloud cover and no stars were showing and no moon. i looked up to the west of my location and in a black cloud there was this brilliant white light staying stationery with what appeared several small white lights dropping from beneath the light. the light and\or object did not move or change locations...just sat there. i watched this for 17 minutes or so and finally the light just went away\disappeared. i have never seen anything like this before especially when it is storming. i felt very unnerved at the time and went inside. the sky appeared normal 2 hours after this incident with no light...just rain clouds.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Burns
There were no other sightings in Burns on or around August 3rd 2009
Summary: BRILLIANT WHITE LIGHT IN BLACK RAIN CLOUD WITH SMALL WHITE LIGHTS COMING FROM BENEATH THE LIGHT
